comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: He is identified in a 1922 New York Times article as Captain E.A. Yarrow, Wesleyan 1901, head of the Caucasus branch of Near East Relief in Armenia. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F30D11FE385D1473... He was in New York on January 19, 1927 , at the annual meeting of Near East Relief to receive the organization's Distinguished Service Medal as a member of its overseas staff. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10D11FF3E5B157A... The four honorees pictured in this collection: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/tags/neareastre...

comment._content:
artolog:

Thanks once again for providing citations with your information! It really makes it easier for us to verify the details and add description to the records.
